original_text: That they may shoot in secret at the perfect: suddenly do they shoot at him, and fear not.
korean_text: 숨은 곳에서 온전한 자를 쏘며 갑자기 쏘고 두려워하지 아니하는도다

sentences.original_text: That they may shoot in secret at the perfect:
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 온전한 자를 비밀리에 쏘게 하려 함이라:

sentences.original_text: suddenly do they shoot at him,
